sinhi_akka.name: Toilet
sinhi_akka.notes: Emetic Akka at any point after leaving her front gate, then either lure and KO the guard or give him a gun to temporarily remove him.

sinhi_akka.name: Smith's Cage
sinhi_akka.notes: Follow Akka into the Hostage Hut and KO.

sinhi_akka.name: Metal Worker Peekaboo
sinhi_akka.notes: Grab the free crowbar or bring one in and peekaboo akka down the side and KO.

noel_crest.name: Toilet
noel_crest.notes: Need to KO the guards if you want to KO Noel and leave him.

noel_crest.name: Stilt Village
noel_crest.notes: Can KO Noel and leave his guards up, be careful of the kills you execute because of the audio.
